channel.title: #blog on Blog of Kasra Darvish
channel.description: Recent content in #blog on Blog of Kasra Darvish

item.title: Blogging
item.description: Tools Jekyll Edit files in BuildBlog folder. Do the following in terminal cd BuildBlog export PATH=$HOME/.gem/ruby/2.6.0/bin:$PATH JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build Then copy the \_site contents to blog folder in your github repo. You should do this every time you add a new post. Hugo Create the website (Once) hugo new site blog_name cd blog_name Add a new post hugo new posts/my-first-post.md Publish The Blog hugo server -D # To see it live hugo -D # To build the website Output will be in .
